recipesJson.name: Slammin Tangerine
recipesJson.author: DodgerFog33
recipesJson.description: The strawberries work perfect in combination with the Tangerine and don't overpower but enhance the Tangerine Flavor. Added the lemon Sicily to give a nice sweet and sour note to the recipe. The black currant adds a bit of tart. Mixed at 60/40 Steep 2-3 day.

reviews.text: This is a really accurate fruity vape, sweet with a bit of sour. It's almost like taking a bite of a nice fresh tangerine.

Nice and tangy mix, with some balanced sweetness. Pretty satisfying for a fruit vape, bit of a sherbet flavour thanks to the tangerine. The lemon sicily takes a few days to blend in well with the mix.
I left off the blackcurrant because I don't have it, and it's like biting into a tangerine with a little zest still attached.
